channel.title: [317] Adding Pk Point Sytstem? [317]
channel.description:
Hey PkerA here,, that making a source out of Delta, and im wondering how can i make a pk point system to my server!
I found out that a pvp server is not any server without a pk shop and for that i need a pk point system!
(ThankS)
BTW::: I HAVE SEARCHE SO DONT SAY!!! /It is something that is called the search buttom/

item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:11, topic:318591”][quote author=pkerA link=topic=415052.msg3055796#msg3055796 date=1260459330]

Look for : } else if (token.equals
And add this code below.

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

i have found out that i cant add commands and other stuff to my server without it getting errors…

(IM DOING EVERYTHING RIGHT)

So does u have another source i can use?

[/quote]

you must be adding it or making something wrong.[/quote]

emm… no i have watched very many tuts and i do it all 3 times and it same have the error!

I cant even make a starter equiment work, That loads with 0 errors and still not working

item.title: [317] Adding Pk Point Sytstem? [317]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos

@relmitos wrote:

The integer can be declared anywhere in the client class.
For saving you’ll have to look for the character saving method, in the client class(search for “characterfile.write”).

item.title: [317] Adding Pk Point Sytstem? [317]
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

zachrida:

go with relmitos

Cant find it![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2009, 07:54:39 am[/size][hr][quote=“relmitos, post:3, topic:318591”]In your client class define a new integer with zero as it’s default value.

public int pkPoints = 0;

Make it save to the characters.

characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Make it load aswell.

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/quote]

Where in the client should i add it?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding Pk Point Sytstem? [317]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

In your client class define a new integer with zero as it’s default value.

public int pkPoints = 0;

Make it save to the characters.

characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Make it load aswell.

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) {
	pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Read full topic
